remarks: If ` Y ` is a normal subgroup of ` G ` , then the "natural map" from elements to their cosets is a group homomorphism from ` G ` to ` G / Y ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
statement:
qusghm.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
qusghm.h $e |- H = ( G /s ( G ~QG Y ) ) $.
qusghm.f $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> [ x ] ( G ~QG Y ) ) $.
qusghm $p |- ( Y e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) -> F e. ( G GrpHom H ) ) $.
$d G x $.
$d H x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
